mapper.select: SELECT RN, APPLICANT_ID, userId, AD_ID, AD_TITLE, RESUME_ID, RESUME_TITLE, APPLICANT_NAME, REGDATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, E.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM APPLICANT_ID, userId, AD_ID, AD_TITLE, RESUME_ID, RESUME_TITLE, APPLICANT_NAME, TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE FROM APPLICANT WHERE userId = '${userId}' ORDER BY APPLICANT_ID DESC )E ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage} GROUP BY RN, APPLICANT_ID, userId, AD_ID, AD_TITLE, RESUME_ID, RESUME_TITLE, APPLICANT_NAME, REGDATE ORDER BY RN
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM APPLICANT WHERE userId like '${userId}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applicant (APPLICANT_ID, userId, AD_ID, AD_TITLE, RESUME_ID, RESUME_TITLE, APPLICANT_NAME, REGDATE) VALUES (seq_applicant_applicant_id.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{ad_id}, #{ad_title}, #{resume_id}, #{resume_title}, #{applicant_name}, SYSDATE)
